articles.description: Ola Electric started deliveries of the S1 and S1 Pro electric scooters on December 15, 2021. On the first day, the company handed over 100 e-scooters to customers in Bangalore and Chennai. The Ola S1 electric scooter was launched on August 15, but deliveries …
articles.content:
